title: Large-Scale Intermediate HTML Practice Course for eCommerce Web Page Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic HTML/CSS understanding and web development tool experience
context.additional_context: Standalone tutorials optimized for smartphone-based learning. Addressing learning gaps through real-time Q&A sessions and strengthening practical skills via project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can implement page structures using 10 or more HTML5 semantic tags required for eCommerce web pages
Learners can correct 80% or more functional issues within web pages using hyperlink error diagnostic tools
Learners can complete mobile-optimized eCommerce pages through responsive image insertion and product listing layout creation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
